timeline.bodyText:
Consider reusing only one instance of YesNoCancelPopup instead of creating a new one every time.
The only things that change would be title and content.
Perhaps you could use the YesNoCancelPopup#isVisible method instead of errorPopUpLock.
Just a suggestion.

Oh, in this case, let's keep the way you did then.
